module.name: model_parameter
module.keywords: module, parameter, model, product, category, schema

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information needed to describe model parameters, mechanism for overriding them and their assignments to products. Model parameters can be classified.

inscope.li: identification of a parameter for a model;
assignment of values to a model parameter;
assignment of a parameter to a model;
assignment of a parameter value to a product;
items within the scope of application module Characteristic, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1654;
items within the scope of application module Classification with attributes, ISO/TS 10303-1111;
items within the scope of application module Independent property representation, ISO/TS 10303-1038.

parameter_assignment <= property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.definition -> represented_definition represented_definition = general_property general_property => model_parameter

sc.description: this is special subtype constraint, which do not allow to populate directly ARM concept, only its subtype within Model_parameter_arm.
